targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container) / count(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container) / count(1, kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container) / count(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container) / count(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$kubenamespace", container=~"$service-?.*"}) by (container)
